name: Nachos
steps: fry off the mince meat until browned
add onion and garlic, cook until softened
add Tomatoes and Red Kidney Beans
simmer for 20 minutes, adding water as needed
add the Old El Paso spice mix with 1/4 cup of water and cook till thickened
place corn chips around the plate with mince meat in the middle
Top with sour cream and Cheese before serving.
